6 class FanRatedInfo {
7 public:
8  FanRatedInfo(double const fanSpeed, double const motorSpeed, double const fanSpeedCorrected,
9  double const densityCorrected, double const pressureBarometricCorrected)
10  : fanSpeed(fanSpeed), motorSpeed(motorSpeed), fanSpeedCorrected(fanSpeedCorrected),
11  densityCorrected(densityCorrected), pressureBarometricCorrected(pressureBarometricCorrected)
12  {}
13 
14 private:
15  double const fanSpeed, motorSpeed, fanSpeedCorrected, densityCorrected, pressureBarometricCorrected;
16  friend class Fan203;

18 
19 class FanShaftPower {
20 public:
21  FanShaftPower(const double motorShaftPower, const double efficiencyMotor, const double efficiencyVFD,
22  const double efficiencyBelt, const double sumSEF)
23  : efficiencyMotor(efficiencyMotor / 100), efficiencyVFD(efficiencyVFD / 100), efficiencyBelt(efficiencyBelt / 100),
24  sumSEF(sumSEF)
25  {
26  motorPowerOutput = motorShaftPower * this->efficiencyMotor * this->efficiencyVFD;
27  fanPowerInput = motorPowerOutput * this->efficiencyBelt;
28  }
29 
37  static double calculateMotorShaftPower(const double voltage, const double amps, const double powerFactorAtLoad) {
38  return voltage * amps * powerFactorAtLoad * std::sqrt(3);
39  }
40 
41  double getFanPowerInput() const { return fanPowerInput; }
42 
43  double getSEF() const { return sumSEF; }
44 
45 private:
46  const double efficiencyMotor, efficiencyVFD, efficiencyBelt;
47  const double sumSEF;
48 
49  double motorPowerOutput, fanPowerInput;
50 };
